A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoureth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>them<s%>; and behind them a <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H3857>burneth<s%>: the <S%H776>land<s%> is as the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>them<s%>, and behind them a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; <S%H6413>yea<s%>, and none hath escaped them.
The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of them is as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and as <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, so do they <S%H7323>run<s%>.

Like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H4818>chariots<s%> on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> do they <S%H7540>leap<s%>, like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H3851>flame<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H398>devoureth<s%> the <S%H7179>stubble<s%>, as a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> set in <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H6186>array<s%>.
At their <S%H6440>presence<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are in <S%H2342>anguish<s%>; all <S%H6440>faces<s%> are <S%H6908>waxed<s%> <S%H6289>pale<s%>.

They <S%H7323>run<s%> like mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>; they <S%H5927>climb<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> like <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>; and they <S%H3212>march<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> on his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and they <S%H5670>break<s%> not their <S%H734>ranks<s%>.

Neither doth <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1766>thrust<s%> <S%H251>another<s%>; they <S%H3212>march<s%> every <S%H1397>one<s%> in his <S%H4546>path<s%>; and they burst <S%H5307>through<s%> the <S%H7973>weapons<s%>, and break not off their <S%H1214>course<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2428>army<s%>; for his <S%H4264>camp<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%>; for he is <S%H6099>strong<s%> that <S%H6213>executeth<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>; for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%>; and who can abide <S%H3557>it<s%>?

Yet even <S%H5002>now<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7725>turn<s%> ye unto me with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with <S%H6685>fasting<s%>, and with <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, and with <S%H4553>mourning<s%>:

Who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> whether he will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H5162>repent<s%>, and <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H4503>him<s%>, even a meal-offering and a <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>?

Then was <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for his <S%H776>land<s%>, and had <S%H2550>pity<s%> on his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

but I will remove far <S%H7368>off<s%> from you the <S%H6830>northern<s%> <S%H5080>army<s%>, and will drive it into a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6723>barren<s%> and <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, its <S%H6440>forepart<s%> into the <S%H6931>eastern<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and its hinder <S%H5490>part<s%> into the <S%H314>western<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and its <S%H889>stench<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%>, and its ill <S%H6709>savor<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%>, because it hath <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things<s%>.
